Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Reproductive System Disorder/Male Reproductive System Disorder/Penile Disorder/Penile Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Paraphimosis
Male Urogenital Diseases/Genital Diseases, Male/Penile Diseases/Phimosis/Paraphimosis
Record.Description: A condition in which the FORESKIN, once retracted, cannot return to its original position. If this condition persists, it can lead to painful constriction of GLANS PENIS, swelling, and impaired blood flow to the penis.
